Dr. Jonathan Mintoff
Legal Services & Legal Consultancy
Dr. Jonathan Mintoff
Legal Services & Legal Consultancy
Contact Details:
Mobile: +356 79 555 633
Email: jm@mintoff.legal
Biography
Av. Jonathan Mintoff is a Maltese lawyer, who was admitted to the bar after graduating from the University of Malta.
In 2020, Jonathan also completed a Master of Laws (LL.M) in Commercial and Corporate Law from the University of London.
He deals mostly with civil, commercial and criminal matters.
He has experience in litigation, both before the Maltese courts -including the Court of Appeal (Superior)- and specialised tribunals such as the Public Contracts Review Board (which deals with public procurement issues).
Av. Jonathan Mintoff is ready to advocate for your rights and provide you with the legal guidance you need. Contact him today to schedule a consultation and take the first step towards resolving your legal challenges.
Legal Practice Areas
Civil Litigation
Property / Real Estate Law
Criminal Defence
Corporate & Commercial Law
Family Law
Employment Law
Estate Planning
Public Procurement
Representation before the the Maltese Courts (including the Court of Appeal) and various Tribunals
